name: verboten
content:

not allowed. This was originally a German word meaning "forbidden": Talking politics at work used to be verboten - just like discussing sex and religion. He claimed that the unjust treatment of Native Americans is a verboten subject in many American schools.

The study shows that a whole list of foods generally considered verboten to those prone to migraines may not stand up to scientific scrutiny.Bank fishing is verboten on the lake because of the importance to nesting birds of the surrounding marsh-lands.
